channel.title: Comments on: Organic pastoral paradise at Dikencik Cottages

item.title: By: Why Turkey should be on your bucket list | Getaway Travel Blog
item.dc:creator: Why Turkey should be on your bucket list | Getaway Travel Blog
item.description: [...] one of Turkey’s most beautiful beaches, swimming in sea the colour of jewellery, staying in on an organic farm in the mountains, driving through tiny villages (just a few kilometres from tourist-packed coastal resorts) where [...]
